msg.msgText:
Usage: ismserver export help ismserver export URL Object=Connection Name=value Type=type ismserver export URL Object=Connection Kind=volume Supported options for Connection level monitoring statistics: Kind Kind of statistics. Valid kinds is "volume". If Kind is specified, Name and Type will be ignored. Name Name of an Endpoint. Type The endpoint's monitoring data type. The valid types are: NewestConnection NewestConnection HighestThruputMsgs LowestThruputMsgs HighestThruputKB LowestThruputKB
Supported options for Endpoint level monitoring statistics: Kind Kind of statistics. Valid kinds are "current","historical". connect_active -- Currently active connections connect_count -- Connection count since reset bad_connect_count -- Count of connections which have failed to connect since reset lost_msg_count -- Count of messages lost for size or queue depth warn_msg_count -- Count of messages lost for size or queue depth for some but not all destinations read_msg_count -- Message count since reset read_bytes_count -- Bytes count since reset write_msg_count -- Message count since reset write_bytes_count -- Bytes count since reset Duration The time (in second) span of data to be collected.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
